snippet: The leaders, Mahmoud Ghozlan and Abdul Rahman al-Barr, were arrested this week after evading the police for nearly two years, security officials said.
abstract: Senior Muslim Brotherhood leaders Mahmoud Ghozlan and Abdul Rahman al-Barr are arrested in Cairo after evading police for almost two years.
lead_paragraph: The leaders, Mahmoud Ghozlan and Abdul Rahman al-Barr, were arrested this week after evading the police for nearly two years, security officials said.

headline.main: Egypt Says It Has Arrested 2 Senior Muslim Brotherhood Leaders
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: 2 Brotherhood Officials Arrested
